text: 20:31 Luk 1:4; Jon 3:15-16; 5:24; Rom 1:17; 1 Pita 1:8-9; 1 Jon 5:13Ezɨ akar kɨ osirizir kam, kɨ kamaghsua, ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Iesusɨn ikiasa, kɨ an osiri. A Gumazir God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezim, a Godɨn Otarim. Eghtɨ ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikɨva, egh ia an ziamɨn zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim iniam. Kɨ kamaghsua, akɨnafarir kam an osiri.
